content.rendered: Arita-yaki is a broad term for traditional Japanese porcelain. A limited edition of only 100 hand made and hand painted wonderful decanters have been produced, making this 30 Year Old Hibiki an extremely rare and collectible item.

excerpt.rendered:
• Strength: 43%
  • Bottle Size: 75 cl
  • Distillery / Blender: Blended Whisky
  • Region: Japan
  • Lot Type: Full Size
